allow: Bash(spec: Issue spec like "17-23" or "17,18,19" or "17-19,25")
Bash(Sorted list of unique issue numbers)
Bash(TEAX_INSECURE=1 poetry run teax issue edit:*)
Bash(TEAX_INSECURE=1 poetry run teax deps add:*)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: correct dependency API field names and add SSL skip option

- Fix IssueMeta field names: owner/repo/index instead of dependentOwner etc
- Add TEAX_INSECURE=1 env var to skip SSL verification for self-hosted CAs
EOF
\)")
